overview:
Ronan is a smart college graduate looking to enter the e-learning sector.

Whilst doing a project for college he came up with The Church Of Crockford which he used for his Advanced Rich Internet Application Module.

He noticed that children between the ages of 10-16 had no online websites/web apps that teaches them how to design/develop websites. At the moment the only website doing online lessons and tutorials is w3schools.com but sadly everything on there is designed for an older audience and is therefore hard to follow/use if you are a younger person.
